entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
